titles.title: To provide that a State may not take into account income from sources outside the State in determining the amount of tax imposed on the income of nonresidents.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 5/20/1993--Introduced. Prohibits a State, in determining the amount of income tax on nonresidents, from taking into account income from sources outside such State.
